title: Got in game message to be perma ban
body: I just got an in game message that my account was to be permanently ban after this game due to player behavior. I've never had a chat restriction or any bans on my account in the 7 years I've been playing. I'm not a toxic person but sure I might rage from time to time, manly on forms not in game.  2nd to last game I play, top lane teemo was calling everyone GAY BOIs the whole game so I report move on and middle of next game I get the message I'm being perma ban... what is going on riot? Will be sending a ticket also and when everything is proven to be false and my account is return I would like some compensation for an unjust ban.

replies.body: I'm not seeing any punishments on this account, but if you want to shoot me the Summoner name of the account that was punished I can check up on it for you so I can explain a bit about what happened.
Thanks learned it was people hold shift to put spaces in chat long and sending people messages looking like system messages.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 


Please report anyone trying to falsify Riot messages or otherwise trick you into thinking you've received messages from Riot. Last I checked, impersonating Rioters could be viewed as a punishable offense for various reasons, tricking people such as this would be one of them.
I did in your live chat with a ticket

If you made any racist or homophobic remarks, that can get you escalated to a permaban without any prior punishments. So can excessive feeding / gameplay toxicity after manual review. Or your account might have been locked due to suspicious activity on your account (scripting, boosting, account sharing, etc.) or a chargeback. You need to submit a support ticket to find out.

I'm not sure if they still do this, but the e-mail you get will have a date when the suspension ends (some 100 years from now) that hints to what the suspension was for. See [this thread](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3047538).
Thanks learned it was people holding shift and enter to put spaces in chat long and then typing the system message and sending people messages looking like system messages.
